Though their reception number is not reachable, but they give note to search inside the inn. Traveler need to give deposit money, give ID card and fill in guest form. The inn only 7minutes distance by walking, I got a clean and very comfortable. Not recommended for elder, big sized traveler or traveler with toddler because the bed is on 2nd floor and they have high stair steps. Their bathroom kinda clean, but small and the shower didn't go well (but they give us toilet wasser).  So far, i feel very satisfied and comfortable stayed there, thank you for the friendliness ^^

Fasilitas yang dijamin Airy vs kenyataan:
positif. TV: chanel banyak, tp tdk ada remote
2. Free Wi-Fi: ada, tp koneksi sangat lambat bahkan utk aplikasi pengirim pesan pun tdk bs digunakan
3. AC: memuaskan
4. Comfy & clean bed: hanya 'clean'
5. Hot& cold shower: hanya 'cold'
6. Amenity kit: memuaskan
7. Free mineral water: memuaskan
